name: Dittman Incentive Marketing
tag_list: sales-incentives, incentive-marketing, employee-engagement, employee-enrichment, merchandise-rewards, group-travel-rewards, performance-rewards
overview:
For 35 years, Dittman Incentive Marketing has helped some of America’s successful companies achieve extraordinary results and exceed their business goals using incentive marketing programs that include group travel, individual travel, merchandise rewards, and gift cards.

Today’s incentive marketing programs leverage exclusive SaaS solutions to provide the communications and metrics necessary to monitor and evaluate effectiveness of employee motivation. Dittman TotalPROÂ® (Performance Recognition Online) is a robust, scalable, modular software platform that allows clients to consolidate all performance improvement programs for maximum employee engagement and measurable ROI.

TotalPROÂ® helps companies attract, engage, motivate, and retain top talent by drawing together all recognition and rewards initiatives to a single, easy-to-use, client-branded site. A global points system allows people to earn in a variety of ways so they aspire to higher levels of personal enrichment while demonstrating your corporate brand values. Activate a single module or a series of modules that make sense for your culture and brand.
